## Scope

Add manual_advance event handling. Verify configurable timeouts work end-to-end.

## Relevant AC from spec (#1)

**Manual advance:**

- Given any active dunning state
  When manual_advance → transition to next state in escalation sequence
  And appropriate action descriptors returned

**Configurable timeouts:**

- Given custom timeout configuration
  When time-based transitions evaluated
  Then custom timeouts used instead of defaults

- Given no custom config
  Then default timeouts used

## Files

- `src/transition.ts` — extend transition function
- `tests/transition.test.ts` — extend tests

## Dependencies

- Depends on: #6 (pause/resume — completes active state handling)

Refs #1
title: feat(state-machine): implement manual advance and configurable timeouts
